Legal_Issue: Can the plaintiffs' action be dismissed due to delays in compliance with court orders?
Procedural_Stage: Status reviews, show-cause submissions, dismissal stage
Decision_Outcome: Action dismissed for delay due to unjustified non-compliance with court orders
Legal_Rule: Non-compliance with court orders and schedules can lead to dismissal of actions for delay
Procedural_Issue: Plaintiffs' failure to meet deadlines including serving affidavits and conducting discovery
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Court issued notices and orders before dismissal
Key_Evidence_Considered: Failure to serve affidavits, conduct discovery, respond to court orders
Legal_Provision: Federal Court Rules, 1998 - Non-compliance leading to dismissal
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Repeated delays in filing documents and following court-ordered schedules
Applicable_Process: Compliance with court orders, discovery, affidavit service
